text: Gabriel Correia da Mata (born 25 December 1999), commonly known as Bodão, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Volta Redonda. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Volta Redonda |2019 |Série C |2||0||1Appearances in the Campeonato Carioca||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||1Appearances in the Copa Rio||0||4||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !2!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!4!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Volta Redonda Futebol Clube players
